name: CO2 Offset
description: GreenHouseGas/CO2 compensation as a service. Get 1kg/month for free to see how easy it is to implement.

api_methods.name: List existing Compensations
api_methods.description: Returns a list of all existing co2offset certificates linked to account.

utterances.utterance: Can you show me all the CO2 offset certificates I have?
What are the CO2 compensations linked to my account?
List all the carbon offset certificates associated with my profile.
Could you provide me with a list of my existing CO2 compensations?
I’d like to see all the CO2 offset certificates I’ve accumulated.
What CO2 compensations are currently linked to my account?
Can you display all the carbon offset certificates I’ve earned?
Show me the list of CO2 compensations I’ve received so far.
What are all the CO2 offset certificates tied to my account?
Give me an overview of all the CO2 compensations I’ve been awarded.

api_methods.name: Retrieve Compensation
api_methods.description: Response contains full compensation details (if exists, and owner is account).

utterances.utterance: Can you show me the compensation details for my account?
What are the compensation details for this account?
Please retrieve the compensation information for my account.
I need the compensation details for this account.
Could you fetch the compensation details for my account?
Show me the compensation details for this account.
What is the compensation status for my account?
Retrieve the compensation details for this account.
Can you provide the compensation information for my account?
I’d like to see the compensation details for this account.

api_methods.name: Compensate GHG/CO2
api_methods.description:
**Compensate given amount of GHG/CO2eq and provides certificate reference as result.**
